speedlify:consumer_electronics

Benchmark Consumer & Electronics web sites over time. Updates at most once every 1440 minutes. Only the last 10 runs (and the oldest run) are shown. Created by @zachleat.

Deploy your own instance of Speedlify and test your web sites.
